# B 

```{r}
roc_mat <- as.data.table(openxlsx::read.xlsx("./analysis/00.FigureTables/Rebuttal/Nov12/Figures/Data/Fig3B.xlsx", 1))
AUCs <- as.data.table(openxlsx::read.xlsx("./analysis/00.FigureTables/Rebuttal/Nov12/Figures/Data/Fig3B.xlsx", 2))
```

```{r }
ggplot(roc_mat, aes(x = 1 - Specificity, y = Sensitivity, colour = Dataset)) + 
  geom_path(size = 1) + 
  geom_text(data = AUCs, mapping = aes(x = 0.75, y = 3:1/10, label = paste("AUC:", round(AUC, 3))), size = 6) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1", guide = guide_legend(nrow = 1)) +
  lims(x = c(0, 1), y = c(0, 1)) + 
  labs(tag = "b") + 
  theme_bw(base_size = 22) + 
  theme(legend.position = c(.5, 1.1), 
        legend.title = element_blank(), 
        legend.background = element_blank(), 
        legend.box.background = element_blank(), 
        panel.grid = element_blank(), 
        plot.tag = element_text(size = 30, face = "bold")) -> p1
p1
```


# C


```{r}
cM <- openxlsx::read.xlsx("./analysis/00.FigureTables/Rebuttal/Nov12/Figures/Data/Fig3C.xlsx", rowNames = T)
```

```{r}
m1 <- reshape2::melt(as.matrix(cM))
colnames(m1)[3] <- "Percentage"
ggplot(data = m1, aes(x = Var1, y = Var2, fill = Percentage)) + 
  geom_tile() + 
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "#FFF5F0", high = "#67000D") + 
  labs(x = "Prediction", y = "Reference") +
  theme_bw(base_size = 22) + 
  theme(plot.margin = unit(c(0.25, 0, 0, 0), "lines"), 
        legend.position = "bottom")  -> p3

ggplot(data.table(A = factor(rownames(cM), levels = rownames(cM)), Percentage = rowSums(cM)), aes(x = A, y = Percentage)) + 
  geom_col(fill = "#A50F15") + 
  labs(tag = "c") + 
  theme_bw(base_size = 22) + 
  theme(axis.title.x = element_blank(), 
        axis.text.x = element_blank(), 
        axis.title.y = element_text(hjust = 0), 
        plot.tag = element_text(size = 30, face = "bold"),
        plot.margin = unit(c(0, 0, 0, 0), "lines")) -> p2
```

```{r fig.width=6, fig.height=8}
p2 / p3 + plot_layout(heights = c(2, 8))
```

# E-G


```{r}
Gly_All_Sig_Freq <- as.data.table(openxlsx::read.xlsx("./analysis/00.FigureTables/Rebuttal/Nov12/Figures/Data/Fig3E-G.xlsx", 1))
Arg_All_Sig_Freq <- as.data.table(openxlsx::read.xlsx("./analysis/00.FigureTables/Rebuttal/Nov12/Figures/Data/Fig3E-G.xlsx", 2))
Asp_All_Sig_Freq <- as.data.table(openxlsx::read.xlsx("./analysis/00.FigureTables/Rebuttal/Nov12/Figures/Data/Fig3E-G.xlsx", 3))
```

```{r}
ggplot() + 
  stat_summary(data = Gly_All_Sig_Freq, aes(x = concentration, y = Freq), fun.data = "mean_sd", colour = aa_cols["Gly"]) + 
  geom_smooth(data = Gly_All_Sig_Freq[, .(Freq = mean(Freq)), concentration], aes(x = concentration, y = Freq), method = "lm", se = F, colour = "grey") + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 5, lty = 2, colour = "grey") + 
  labs(x = "Concentration (μM)", y = expression(Signal~frequency~"("*"min"^-1*")"), tag = "g") +
  stat_cor(data = Gly_All_Sig_Freq[, .(Freq = mean(Freq)), concentration], aes(x = concentration, y = Freq), size = 6) + 
  stat_regline_equation(data = Gly_All_Sig_Freq[, .(Freq = mean(Freq)), concentration], 
                        aes(x = concentration, y = Freq, label = paste(..eq.label.., ..adj.rr.label.., sep = "~`,`~~")), 
                        label.y.npc = 0.8, size = 6) + 
  facet_wrap(~ "G") + 
  theme_calc(base_size = 22) + 
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank(), 
        plot.tag = element_text(size = 30, face = "bold"), 
        plot.background = element_blank()) -> pg
```

```{r}
ggplot() + 
  stat_summary(data = Arg_All_Sig_Freq, aes(x = concentration, y = Freq), fun.data = "mean_sd", colour = aa_cols["Arg"]) +
```
